job title: អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្តិសុខ
position: អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្តិសុខ
Job Description:
យើងកំពុងស្វែងរកអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកសន្តិសុខ ដើម្បីរៀបចំ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្នែក នៃ ប្រតិបត្តិការសន្តិសុខរបស់អតិថិជនរបស់យើង។ ក្រុមប្រធានសន្តិសុខ និងសន្តិសុខនឹងស្ថិតនៅក្រោមការទទួលខុសត្រូវរបស់អ្នក។

ក្នុងនាមជាអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកសន្តិសុខ អ្នកត្រូវតែធ្វើជាគំរូល្អ និងទទួលបានទំនុកចិត្ត ពីមនុស្សរបស់អ្នក ដើម្បីសម្រេចបាននូវក្រុមដ៏ល្អមួយ។
គោលដៅគឺដើម្បីបង្កើត និងថែរក្សាបរិយាកាសមួយដែលបុគ្គលិក ភ្ញៀវ និងទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិ របស់អតិថិជនរបស់យើងមានសុវត្ថិភាព និងការពារបានល្អ។

* ទំនួលខុសត្រូវ

•	បង្កើត និងអនុវត្តគោលនយោបាយសន្តិសុខ ពិធីការ និងនីតិវិធី
•	គ្រប់គ្រងថវិកាសម្រាប់ប្រតិបត្តិការសន្តិសុខ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យការចំណាយ
•	រៀបចំផែនការប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងដាក់ពង្រាយបុគ្គលិកសន្តិសុខ។
•	បណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងត្រួតពិនិត្យថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ បុគ្គលិកសន្តិសុខ និងសន្តិសុខ
•	ចូលជួបជាប្រចាំខែ ជាមួយតំណាងរបស់អតិថិជនសម្រាប់ការកែលម្អ។
•	ចូលរួមប្រជុំជាមួយអតិថិជននៅពេលចាំបាច់។
•	រៀបចំផែនការ និងសម្របសម្រួលប្រតិបត្តិការសន្តិសុខសម្រាប់ព្រឹត្តិការណ៍ ជាក់លាក់
•	ប្រឈមនឹងភាពអាសន្ន និងការជូនដំណឹង
•	ពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍អំពីឧប្បត្តិហេតុ និងការបំពាន
•	ស៊ើបអង្កេត និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
•	បង្កើតរបាយការណ៍សម្រាប់ការគ្រប់គ្រងលើស្ថានភាពសុវត្ថិភាព
•	វិភាគ ទិន្នន័យដើម្បីបង្កើតសំណើសម្រាប់ការកែលម្អ (ឧទាហរណ៍ការអនុវត្តបច្ចេកវិទ្យាថ្មី)
•	រាយការណ៍ទៅអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅ
Job Requirement:
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍ជាអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្តិសុខ ឬមុខតំណែងស្រដៀងគ្នា
•	បទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការរាយការណ៍ និងផែនការឆ្លើយតបបន្ទាន់
•	ចំណេះដឹងដ៏ល្អអំពីពិធីការ និងនីតិវិធីសន្តិសុខ
•	ជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងអន្តរបុគ្គល
•	ល្អជាភាសាអង់គ្លេស សរសេរ និងពាក្យសំដី។ (ជម្រើស)
•	ល្អជាភាសាខ្មែរ ការសរសេរ និងពាក្យសំដី
•	ជំនាញរៀបចំ និងដឹកនាំឆ្នើម
•	ស្មោះត្រង់ ប្តេជ្ញាចិត្ត និងអាចទុកចិត្តបាន។

* ប្រាក់ខែ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ និងប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្ត ពី 300 ទៅ 500 ដុល្លារក្នុងមួយខែ
Company Profile: We are a well known security company that provides physical security personnel to factory. Beside that we install cctv and alarm system for our customers.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   081/090/061 (33 99 03) info@cj-security.com No. B24&B25, Borey Phnom Penh Sok San, Trapeng Rom Chek Village, Sangkat Choam Chao 1, Khan Posenchey, Phnom Penh 081/090/061 (33 99 03)

job title: ប្រធានក្រុមសន្តិសុខ
position: ប្រធានក្រុមសន្តិសុខ
Job Description:
យើងកំពុងស្វែងរកប្រធានផ្នែកសន្តិសុខ ដើម្បីរៀបចំ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យក្រុមសន្តិសុខ និងប្រតិបត្តិការសន្តិសុខរបស់អតិថិជនរបស់យើង។ ក្រុមសន្តិសុខនឹងស្ថិតនៅក្រោមការទទួលខុសត្រូវរបស់អ្នក។

ក្នុងនាមជាអ្នកដឹកនាំផ្នែកសន្តិសុខ អ្នកត្រូវតែធ្វើជាគំរូល្អ និងទទួលបានទំនុកចិត្តពីមនុស្សរបស់អ្នក ដើម្បី សម្រេចបាននូវក្រុមដ៏ល្អមួយ។
គោលដៅគឺដើម្បីបង្កើត និងថែរក្សាបរិយាកាសមួយដែលបុគ្គលិក ភ្ញៀវ និងទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់អតិថិជនរបស់យើងមានសុវត្ថិភាព និងការពារបានល្អ។

* ទំនួលខុសត្រូវ


•	បង្កើត និងអនុវត្តគោលនយោបាយសន្តិសុខ ពិធីការ និង នីតិវិធី
•	រៀបចំផែនការប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងដាក់កម្លាំងបុគ្គលិកសន្តិសុខ។
•	ហ្វឹកហ្វឺននិងត្រួតពិនិត្យសន្តិសុខ។
•	ពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍អំពីឧប្បត្តិហេតុ និងការបំពាន
•	ស៊ើបអង្កេតនិង ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
•	បង្កើតរបាយការណ៍សម្រាប់ការគ្រប់គ្រងលើ ស្ថានភាព សុវត្ថិភាព
•	វិភាគ ទិន្នន័យដើម្បីបង្កើតសំណើសម្រាប់ការកែលម្អ ( ឧ. ការអនុវត្តបច្ចេកវិទ្យាថ្មី)
•	រាយការណ៍ទៅប្រធានតំបន់
Job Requirement:
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍ជាប្រធានក្រុមសន្តិសុខ ឬមុខតំណែងស្រដៀងគ្នា
•	បទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការរាយការណ៍ និងផែនការឆ្លើយតបបន្ទាន់
•	ចំណេះដឹងដ៏ល្អអំពីពិធីការ និងនីតិវិធីសន្តិសុខ
•	ជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងអន្តរបុគ្គល
•	ល្អជាភាសាខ្មែរ សរសេរ និង ពាក្យសំដី
•	ជំនាញរៀបចំ និងដឹកនាំឆ្នើម
•	ស្មោះត្រង់ ប្តេជ្ញាចិត្ត និងអាចទុកចិត្តបាន។

- ប្រាក់ខែ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ និងប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្ត ពី 220 ទៅ 400 ដុល្លារក្នុងមួយខែ

* ចំណាំ

ទីតាំងការងារ នៅតាមបណ្តោយផ្លូវជាតិលេខ ៣ នៅត្រឹមបង្គោលគីឡូលេខ ២៧។
ទីតាំងមួយទៀតនៅម្តុំផ្សារជម្ពូវ័ន្ត តាមបណ្តោយផ្លូវកប់ស្រូវ។(ម៉ោងការងារ ៨ម៉ោង)
Company Profile: We are a well known security company that provides physical security personnel to factory. Beside that we install cctv and alarm system for our customers.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   081/090/061 (33 99 03) info@cj-security.com No. B24&B25, Borey Phnom Penh Sok San, Trapeng Rom Chek Village, Sangkat Choam Chao 1, Khan Posenchey, Phnom Penh 081/090/061 (33 99 03)

company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
Job Description: Job SummaryThe Supervisor, Talent and Organizational Development work closely with business leaders to ensure that the organization has the capable and well-qualified talent to drive business growth and continuity and to identify organizational performance and development gaps and develop, implement, and evaluate the required interventions to close the gaps.Key Responsibilities 1.	Analyze the supply and demand of talent through the organization and partner with business leaders to identify, develop, retain, and engage critical talent to help drive business growth and continuity. 2.	Generate and maintain a talent pool so that talent on demand is available to meet requirements for high quality talent to provide for management succession. 3.	Develop the organization as an employer of choice so that high quality talent is attracted, recruited and retained. 4.	Prepare and develop talent for future managerial and leadership positions to ensure continued business growth and success. 5.	Develop performance management framework and processes to raise individual and organizational performance and foster high-performance culture. 6.	Develop and implement organizational competency framework to provide for the foundation for strategic talent processes, including talent planning, resourcing, talent identification, talent development, career and succession planning and performance management. 7.	Develop and implement career development pathways so that talented people can advance their careers withing the organization by moving laterally, vertically or diagonally upward. 8.	Design jobs and develop roles that give people opportunities to apply and grow their skills and provide them with autonomy, interest and challenge. 9.	Plan and implement talent engagement and retention programs to enhance organizational satisfaction, commitment and loyalty. 10.	Identify organizational performance and development gaps and develop, implement, and evaluate the required interventions to close the gaps. 11.	Develop and implement change programs to achieve organizational effectiveness and promote high-performance culture.
Job Requirement: Qualifications 1.	Education: At least Bachelor's degree (Master’s is preferred) in Human Resource Management, Business Administration, Organizational Development or related field2.	Experiences: o	5-8 years of work experience in the field of human resource management, preferably 2 or 3 years working in a HR-business partnership model.o	 Work experience in private sector, preferably in FMCG, supply chain management or manufacturing3.	Skills and knowledge: o	Deep expertise in business acumen, talent strategy, organizational effectiveness and data analysiso	Working knowledge of multiple human resource disciplines, including talent management, performance management, organizational development, succession planning, career planning, coaching and mentoring, and etc.o	People skills (broad understanding of human behaviors, motives and/or practical psychology)o	Relationship building, o	Consulting,o	Project management, o	System thinkingo	Coaching and mentoringo	Strong organizational skillso	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.o	Excellent commination and networking skills o	Computer literacy (Microsoft office and other useful software) o	Language: Strong command both Khmer and English
Company Profile: One Fraternity is a Cambodian-owned company specializing in sales, distribution, and marketing of a wide range of consumer products. Since the establishment in 2010, we have extensive experiences and affiliations with diverse stakeholders, including government institutions, businesses, wholesalers, retailers, agents, and customers across Cambodia. With broad distribution channels and industry expertise, from market research and analysis, assessing customer needs, sales, marketing, or distribution, we help build the strategy that works for our business partners who want to grow their businesses in new and existing markets in Cambodia.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mrs. Chan Sokunthearoth  061997333 recruitment@vital.com.kh Phnom Penh Building No. 888K, Road 598, Sangkat Toul Sangke, Khan Russey Keo,Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia. 061997333

job title: ស្មៀនរដ្ឋបាល និងធនធានមនុស្ស
position: ស្មៀនរដ្ឋបាល និងធនធានមនុស្ស
Job Description:
យើងកំពុងស្វែងរកបេក្ខជនដ៏ល្អម្នាក់ ដើម្បីធ្វើជាមួយផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល និងធនធានមនុស្ស របស់យើងជាស្មៀនរដ្ឋបាល និងធនធានមនុស្ស។

ក្នុងនាមជាស្មៀនរដ្ឋបាល និងធនធានមនុស្ស អ្នកនឹងទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងដំណើរការ នៃទិន្នន័យបុគ្គលិក។ អ្នកក៏នឹងត្រូវចូលរួមក្នុងដំណើរការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកផងដែរ។ អ្នកគួរតែស្ទាត់ជំនាញក្នុងការផ្តល់ជំនួយក្នុងដំណើរការជ្រើសរើស។ អ្នកក៏គួរជួយក្នុង ប្រតិបត្តិការប្រចាំថ្ងៃរបស់នាយកដ្ឋានរដ្ឋបាល និងធនធានមនុស្សផងដែរ។

company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
Job Description: Job SummaryThe role of Supervisor, Fleet Management, is to establish and implement fleet operation procedures to ensure that all vehicles under the control of FMA is well managed, maintained and effectively utilized at optimal cost.Key Responsibilities 1.	Conduct regular safety inspections of vehicles and schedule maintenance on vehicles to ensure that all vehicles are in good working order and prevented from expanded breakdown.2.	Provide training to relevant users of the company vehicles to ensure proper operations and efficient use of the vehicles.3.	Monitor use of fuel/lubricant card, fuel consumption and repair vehicles for minor breakdown to ensure that vehicles are properly repaired.4.	Keep track of vehicle repairing and fuel consumption for an analysis to take corrective actions for efficient use of company vehicles.5.	Monitor GPS of the vehicles to ensure that GPS is functional and necessary data is retrievable from GPS when needed be.6.	Maintain a checklist for legal documents required for vehicles to ensure that all vehicles have documents in response to legal requirements.  7.	Conduct a regular inspection on vehicles to ensure that the vehicles are properly cared of by users and no incidents occurred to the vehicles without notices.8.	Register and license all vehicles under FMA management on a timely manner to ensure that there is no penalty.9.	Administer online vehicle booking system so that the system is fully functional in line with operations.10.	Manage vehicles assigned to be based in provinces so that the vehicles are used for the intended purposes, properly maintained and repaired.11.	Coordinate and provide support to vehicle users when incident occurred including vehicle breakdown, road accident and other emergency to ensure safety and minimize operation disruptions with timely assistance and resolution of incidents.12.	Perform other tasks as required.
Job Requirement: 1.	Education: o	Bachelor’s Degree in any discipline or certificate or relevant skills. Degree in mechanics is a plus.2.	Experiences: o	2-3 years of working experience administering fleet services3.	Skills and knowledge: o	Have relevant technical or mechanic skills (auto mechanics, vehicle maintenance/repairs)o	Computer literacy (Microsoft office) o	Language: Good command of Khmer and English

company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
Job Description: Job SummaryThe role of Supervisor, Premise and Safety, is to plan, implement and monitor procedures related to premise management, workplace security and safety to ensure that company premises are safe, secured and kept in order for smooth operations of the company in achieving business objectives.Key Responsibilities 1.	Coordinate with relevant Functions to plan and execute workplace safety so that incidents at workplace are eliminated.2.	Plan and manage a maintenance schedule to the company premise in consultation with relevant Functions so that the company’s assets are well-maintained and operational.3.	Lead, monitor and coach safety team to support the implementation of workplace safety procedures so that the company’s employees are safe and healthy.4.	Oversee security guards to ensure the safety of company premises by preventing all types of hazards.5.	Assist in conducting environmental impact assessment to ensure compliance with environmental regulations and minimize environmental impact.6.	Closely monitor performance of security guards to prevent negligence and/or undesirable conducts from taking place. 7.	Provide regular training and instructions to all security guards to make sure they understand their tasks and responsibilities. 8.	Promote a safety culture to ensure that staff and management are well aware about workplace safety. 9.	Investigate and evaluate every incident related to workplace safety (if any) to make sure that necessary information/data is well captured, analyzed and reported for future improvements. 10.	Orient contractors about workplace safety and waste management before they start working for the company so that they can work safely and responsibly.11.	Monitor practices in safety and usage of Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) to achieve zero accident at the workplace.12.	Conduct fire drill and fire evacuation to raise awareness to all staff and management to cope with fire incidents.13.	Supervise security guards and provide them with appropriate tools to ensure that they perform their tasks as required.14.	Perform other tasks as required by supervisor.
Job Requirement: 1.	Education: o	Bachelor’s Degree in Administration, Management, Accounting, any relevant fields2.	Experiences: o	5-years relevant experiences in work safety management and administration3.	Skills and knowledge: o	HSE management system o	Good command of computer literacy (Microsoft office) o	Good command of Khmer and English (Writing, Speaking, Listening, and Reading)

company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
Job Description:
1. Ensure production running smoothly and efficiency with high productivity.
2. Control and improve packaging material to minimize the loss in the packaging line.
3. Involve and take corrective action of machine owner to achieve the highest quality and quantity of product.
4. Assist line leader to complete the daily operation report correctly and on time.
5. Perform and investigate Root Cause Failure Analysis by following the manual operation and troubleshooting of machine to ensure the production runs smoothly with high productivity.
6. Ensure the sustainability in the actual practice of ISO (QMS, FSMS, EMS), GMP and HACCP among subordinate to achieve highest quality and food safety of product in each process from packaging material to finish goods.
7. Ensure equipment maintenance and minor repair in the packaging line to restore the basic condition of plant equipment with Occupational Health and Safety manner.
8. Implement and maintain 5S + 2S (5S, Safety and Security) at packaging areas to ensure safety and improvement on working environment.
9. Other tasks will be assigned from time to time.
Job Requirement:
1. Education:
- Bachelor Degree in Technical Skill, Engineering or equivalent

2. Experiences:
- Fresh or 1 year of experience in Technical Management or equivalent in FMCG Manufacturing

3. Skills and knowledge:
- Working knowledge of ISO, GMP, 5S and HACCP in a manufacturing environment
- Competencies in computer and Microsoft offices skills
- Good level of English (Writing, listening and Speaking)

job title: 中文老师 / Chinese Teacher (Mon -Fri 12:15 pm to 4:15 pm)
position: 中文老师 / Chinese Teacher (Mon -Fri 12:15 pm to 4:15 pm)
Job Description: 一，招聘说明- 要成为一名教师的选择，而不是默认情况下，.- 写教案，它准确地贯彻落实.- 为了获得相关的专业教育和培训，以获得正确的教学理念.- 诚实和诚意向专业.- 接受，作为一名教师并不会让你“知道一切”，所以重要的是要成为一个合作伙伴与您的学生在学习周期.- 接受没有两个学生认为，行动和反应的一致好评，并尊重多样性。- 升级知识，学习新的教学方法.- 避免沉迷不道德的行为，在任何时候都保持尊严的一个老师与学生的关系.二。对学生- 自例子灌输模型的行为和举止.- 按照学校的教育系统的指引，准备长期的教学计划和日常的经验教训.- 提供从事和挑战学生智力活动和材料.- 理解和实施利用信息技术在备课和教学.- 按住Shift键之间的正式和非正式的教学方法;辩论，讨论，实践活动，实验项目和游览.- 规划，设置和评估等级的测试，考试和作业.- 在上课，中午和其他休息时间，监督学生行为.- 了解不同背景的学生，他们的实力，弱点来自和感兴趣的领域.- 诚实的学生考核，避免偏袒.- 执行纪律，坚决教室规则设置.- 鼓励积极的辩论，解决学生之间的冲突.- 随时调整教学方式，以满足学生的个性化需求.
Job Requirement: Level: MiddleTerm: Part Time (Hourly)Work Experience: 1 yearQualification: Bachelor DegreeLanguageChinese-Mandarin -- ExcellentKhmer -- Good  or  English -- AverageSex: FemaleAge: 29 ~ 40Description- Help kids learn skills along with the teacher职位要求- 工作时间: 星期一到五 下午 12:15 - 4:15   - 男性和女性欢迎- 要诚实- 要灵活，耐心和诚实的强有力的承诺和完成任务.- 准时的时间和良好的人际沟通技巧- 能满足学生的需求- 体验教学表现与支持证明自己的技能面积至少三年.- 应该是双循环学习教师.- 随时免费获得新的创新- 在教学和提高学生专注于他们喜欢的任何技能熟练.- 支持材料学生
Company Profile:
M-TEL International School is a private school in Phnom Penh that offers English, Khmer and Chinese programs from Kindergarten to Secondary. Our English programs follows the Canadian Curriculum and IPC from England and Khmer program is based on the natioanal curriculum by the Ministry of Education Youth and Sport of Cambodia.

Job Description:
1. Scope of working

Senior Business Analyst: is responsible for the discovery, researching progressive system solutions to evaluating the impacts, and development of innovative solutions for companies to modernize digital landscape and implement strategic initiative for improved efficiency and profitability of all stakeholders toward the future growth and success.

2.Duties & responsibilities:

- Partner with stakeholders across business units to develop analyses and documentation in a collaborative way, communicating effectively and efficiently with managerial, and executive teams.
- Evaluate, analyze, and communicate systems requirements on a continuing basis, and maintain systems processes, including the delivery of requirement document, implementation status, developer document, user guide, and training document. 
- Conduct daily systems analytics to maximize effectiveness and troubleshoot problems.
- Develop meaningful and lasting relationships with partners for optimized systems integration and respond to questions and concerns from managers and executives with supporting research and recommendations.
- Other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
3. Qualification & Requirement

- At least five or more years of experience in analytics and systems development.
- High proficiency with SQL and database management.
- Proven analytical abilities.
- Experience in generating process documentation and reports.
- Excellent communication skills, with an ability to translate data into actionable insights.
- Strong working knowledge of relevant Microsoft applications, including MS Visio and MS Project.
- Proven ability to manage projects and user testing.
- Extensive experience with data visualization.
- High proficiency in technical writing.
- Knowledge of programming and UI/UX design is the preferred.

4. Working Days and Hours

-Monday to Saturday Morning: 8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch Time: 12:00pm to 1:00pm

5. Working place

- Senior IT Business Analyst: is based in Head Office, Department of IT.

6. Relationship

- Senior IT Business Analyst works under supervision & report directly to IT Programming Manager.

7. Salary and Benefit

- Salary (Negotiable)
- Annual Bonus
- Annual Salary increment
- Annual Staff Party
- Education Sponsorship
- Internal and External Training 
- Special price for House loan
- Seniority Pay

Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEWThe SME Bank plans to expand its product/services via digital channels: Mobile/Internet Banking, ATM, and payment and collection capability partnering with payment service partners.The incumbent will fulfill the IT security management role to ensure controls are implemented to mitigate risks within the organization. S/he will conduct regular reviews of the technology gaps and risks and provide regular information security training to promote awareness to the staff at all levels. S/he will also participate in solution project implementation to provide expertise andindependent inputs to ensure standard compliance.JOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES- Perform IT security gaps analysis to comply with NBC TRM.- Review and maintain up-to-date IT security policies and standards.- Ensure solutions implementations comply with regulatory and security requirements andstandards.- Review IT change management and user access management.- Conduct regular IT security reviews.- Provide IT security training and awareness to users.- Maintain IT risk register and mitigation action plans.- Communicate between IT and internal/external audit on required assessments.- Collaborate with management and related units to improve the security posture.- Document any security breaches and assess their impact and damage.- Coordinate and document information security incident response; ensure processes and procedures are tested regularly in line with IT continuity, Business Continuity Plan (BCP).- Promote cyber security awareness at all levels of management and employees by maintaining and developing a positive culture of compliance against IT security policy, industry standards, and regulations.- Provide line manager quality analysis to support decision-making.- All other matters ancillary to the above and other related issues management may require from time to time.
Job Requirement: ** Skills & AbilitiesPERSON SPECIFICATION Knowledge- Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science or Information Technology- 3-5 years experience in IT security management and/or IT Audit.- Knowledge of IT Risk and Governance is preferred.- Knowledge of COBIT, NIST, PCI DSS, or ISO27001.- Good command of English, communication, interpersonal, problem-solving, analytical, and organizationskills

How to apply:
Interested candidates are invited to send CV to us via our Telegram number 078 983 003 or email job.wild@shintamani.com. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified of a job interview.
Company Profile: All-Inclusive Luxury and Adventure. Nestled deep within the wilderness of the Southern Cardamom National Park, in a pristine wildlife corridor, Shinta Mani Wild – A Bensley Collection is an all-inclusive luxury camp with just 15 tents. Entry to the camp is via a 400m zip line ride over the forest canopy, rivers and a waterfall to the Landing Zone Bar where the General Manager and your Bensley Butler greet you on arrival. Creative luxury adventures include exploring the untrammelled waterways of South East Asia’s last wild estuarine ecosystem aboard a custom Bensley-designed expedition boat; or joining Wildlife Alliance rangers on anti-poaching patrols. Ever changing menus are inspired by sustainably foraged wild edible plants from the forest and organic farm. The Khmer Tonics Spa provides organic chemical-free treatments including a river-stone foot massage while soaking in a waterfall pool. The 100 sqm tents are perfect for spending a relaxing day doing nothing but enjoying your tent and its expansive private view, some with waterfalls.
Contact Info: Contact Information Solika Heng (Ms.) HR Manager 078983003 job.wild@shintamani.com Phnom Penh 078983003

job title: ជំនួយការឃ្លាំង/ Warehouse Assistant ( Picker)
position: ជំនួយការឃ្លាំង/ Warehouse Assistant ( Picker)
Job Description: 1.To assist the WHC in handling goods inspection when receive goods from principal, goods return from sales and consignment, and prepare “Goods Inspection Report” 2.To assist the WHC in handling goods Issuing for sales and consignment for Phnom Penh and Provinces  3.To assist the WHC in handling reconciliation for goods returning from provinces 4.To conduct physical count daily/semi/ annually Physical count when suggest by WHC 5.To update and maintain the temperature control cards 6.To report to WHC immediately and permanently the Damages and expired products 7.To ensure that the goods are stored according to “Storing Guideline” 8.To ensure that the warehouse compounds are neat and tidy 9.To clean warehouse area at all the time 10.To assist other co-worker in related job 11.To comply the company, rule & regulation 12.To participate with Quality Environment (5S) 13.To perform other related tasks as assigned by superior.
Job Requirement: 1.Vocational training or associated degree   education  2.Minimum one-year experience in related field is preferable  3.Experience in pharmaceutical is an advantage  4.Good communication skill  5.Hard working and patience  6.Honest
Company Profile:
The Dynamic Group has been supporting Cambodia's healthcare, agriculture, quality control industries for the last 20s years. Our vision is improving Quality of Life, Shaping Better Tomorrows. With over 400 highly-qualified staffs, the Dynamic Group leads in applying global technologies and delivering value to the various communities that we are serving.

With no fewer than seven companies in its stable, the Dynamic Group brings the world’s latest technological advancements to one of the world’s fastest growing economies.

All of our companies in Dynamic Group are:
-Dynamic Pharma
-Agrotech Vita
-Dynamic Scientific
-Dynamic Distribution
-Dynamic Chemicals
-Dynamic Argon
-Dynamic Technologies
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Yong Dalin  012803918 careers@dynamic.com.kh Phnom Penh #432, Street Preah Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh 12301, Cambodia 012803918

Job Description:
•	规划和准备课程
•	分析学生的学习能力，并根据学生的教育要求与确保课程的有效传递和及时完成进行教学
•	通过撰写学生报告来协助学生
•	评估，记录和报告学生的学习进度和成就
•	根据学校政策保持学生良好的秩序和纪律
•	如有需要，参与规划员工发展和绩效考核
•	执行其他指定的教师相关任务
Job Requirement:
•	汉语专业，大学毕业生优先
•	能熟练使用中文：听、说、读、写流利，以及能熟练使用电脑
•	至少有一到两年以上的教学经验
•	有创业、热爱教学事业、有耐心、责任性、性格积极向上
•	熟悉管理课堂与了解教学方法；跟学生、家长与同事相处融洽
•	能独立工作与团队合作

Job Description: - Support in HSE monitoring (identification, assessment, controls) for head office, distribution centers, and provincial branches.- Support in monitoring of Security guards, and Janitors in all locations.Support in premises’ space management (fit-out, space modification).- Monitor facility management services including Builder works, Mechanical, Electrical, Plumbing, HVAC, Fire safety system, and Building security system.Regularly monitor and review hygiene, security and safety outcomes.- Work closely with technician teams on all preventive and reactive maintenance tasks.- Support manager in payment process, and operating expenditure against operating budgets to ensure efficiency.- Assist in facility & HSE’s data reconciliation with trend analysis, and implementing initiatives related to sustainability and environment.
Job Requirement: Functional Skills And KnowledgeDemonstrate understanding and application of local regulations into the company's facility management systems and processesDemonstrate project management skillsDemonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spokenEducationDiploma/degree in Engineering, Business Management, or equivalentWork Experience- Minimum three years’ experience in engineering sectors, or facility and building management.
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

job title: មន្រ្តីជំនួយការផ្នែកត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងវាយតម្លៃ
position: មន្រ្តីជំនួយការផ្នែកត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងវាយតម្លៃ
Job Description:
ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែង ដែលមានគោលបំណង      កែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្ត ជំហានបន្ទាប់ទៀត។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ (អ.គ.ហ.) ជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុមាន មុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និង   ការអនុវត្តការងារគោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួល ការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ។ 
ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព សក្ដិសិទ្ធភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អ.គ.ហ. មានតម្រូវការជ្រើសរើសមន្រ្តីជំនួយការផ្នែកត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងវាយតម្លៃ ចំនួន១រូប ដែលមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិដូចខាងក្រោម៖

 គុណវុឌ្ឍិទូទៅ
• មានសញ្ញាបត្រកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកសេដ្ឋកិច្ច ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬវិស័យ ប្រហាក់ប្រហែល ផ្សេងទៀត
• មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកដែលខ្លួនទទួលខុសត្រូវយ៉ាងតិច០១ឆ្នាំ
• មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេសដែលអាចប្រើការជាផ្លូវការបាន
• មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង  និងអាចបំពេញការងារជាក្រុម 
• មានឆន្ទៈ និងការប្តេជ្ញាខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារកែទម្រង់
• មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត មានជំនាយញទំនាកទំនង និងអាចបំពេញការងារក្រុម។
• ជាមន្ត្រីរាជការដែលមានក្របខ័ណ្ឌនៅក្នុងក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងក្រសួង-ស្ថាប័ន
• ស្ម័គ្រចិត្តព្យួរការងារដោយរក្សាទុកនូវមុខតំណែង និងប្រាក់បៀវត្ស ប្រាក់បំណាច់ មុខងារ និងប្រាក់ បំណាច់ផ្សេងនៅអង្គភាពដើម ដើម្បីមកបម្រើការការងារពេញម៉ោងនៅអគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋាន

 ឯកសាភ្ជាប់
បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ៖
• ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter (ជាភាសាអង់គ្លេស) 
• សញ្ជាបត្របញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សាថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធនានា 
• ភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប
Job Requirement:
	ការជ្រើសរើស 
ការជ្រើសរើសត្រូវធ្វើឡើងតាមរយៈការសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់ពីគណៈកម្មការជ្រើសរើស។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។ 
	ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំជ្រើសរើស 
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច Email: hr@pfm.gov.kh យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃព្រហស្បតិ៍ ១៥កើត ខែស្រាពណ៍ ឆ្នាំថោះ បញ្ចស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៧ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី៣១ ខែសីហា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ អ.គ.ហ. ទទួលពាក្យស្នើសុំចុះឈ្មោះចូលបម្រើការងារតាមរយៈប្រព័ន្ធអនឡាញ (Online) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
ចំណាំ៖ មានតែបេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលបានជាប់ជម្រុះបឋម (Shortlisted) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដែលនឹងត្រូវអញ្ជើញមកសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់។

	ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម
សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE
ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទាក់ទងមកលេខទូរស័ព្ទ ឬតាមអាស័យដ្ឋានដូចខាងក្រោម៖
ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ	
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ

Job Description:
- In charge of day to day management of operations on site, ensuring that the project is brought to a successful completion and meets the required time, budget and quality constraints.
- Ensure timely management of any unforeseen delays. Regular monitoring and liaison with the Contracts - supervisor, Project Manager on the Master Programs and development of stage/section programs required.
- Liaise with the procurement team and other stakeholders to ensure adequate labor and sub-contract resource are available on site.
- Carry out toolbox briefings to the site teams and sub-contractors.
- Plan and efficiently organize the site facilities and logistics, ensuring all equipment on site is fit
for purpose and only operated by appropriately trained staff
- Requisition all materials and oversee the deliveries and ensure they are done so in adequate time in line with the construction program and procurement schedule.
- Effectively communicate with the Design Team to ensure the timely release of design information.
o Supervise, manage and motivate all site team including effective management of sub-contractor
activities on site ensuring they are engaged, on target in line with the master program.
- Prepare site documents, make daily report work​ and progress work​ report.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in civil engineering or any related field.
- At least 3 years’ experience as site Engineer that related with interior work and willing to work overtime.
- Good command in English, and Vietnamese is require,
- Computer fluency in Word, Excel and PowerPoint
- Good inter-personal skills, must be able to communicate well with staff
- Ability to interpret plans, liaise with clients, architects and project manager.
- Demonstrate innovative approaches to problem solving and develop ideas from conceptualization to completion
- Must have a good knowledge of available materials/products and different techniques and resources available
- Strong team player, working effectively with all staff members at all levels
- A positive work ethic with excellent attention to detail and accuracy
- Ability to work autonomously to meet deadlines
- Be friendly, flexible, honest, hard-working, and be able to work under pressure.

JON BENIFIT
o Overtime
o Bonus after 1 year working
o Salary will increase depend on outcome work.
o Annual Leave
o Annual Staff Party.
o Annual Trip.
o Seniority
o NSSF and Accident Insurance

WORKING HOUR
o MONDAY – SATURDAY
- 8:30-5:30 (12:00-13:00 BREAKTIME )
o Holiday ( Sunday and public holiday)

Job Description:
- Assist GM in all day to day tasks, including general oversight of external and internal reporting requirements.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Job Description: Operational Dimension• Business Modeling: business planning, and project planning to advise the GROUP ExCo and the Board on potential investment and business models for KMH Industrial moving forward.• Market Insights: lead/commission research/study to gain insight of the industry and find our strategic niche in the sector.• Work with the CEO to come up with a lean organization structure, service proposition and improve the existing standard of operation procedure to effectively run the park.• Transformation & Transition: strategizing the smooth transition from KMH Park 1 to KMH Park 2.• The future beyond KMH Park 2: advise the GROUP ExCo and the Board on strategic acquisition, territories, new tenant segmentations and infrastructure needed to support those strategic moves.• Environmental, Health and Safety (EHS): Lead and be accountable for the continual improvement and development of the companies.• EHS standards, and ensuring compliance across all relevant policies, procedures local legislative requirements.Management and Relationship Dimension• Foster good relationship with existing tenants to understand their challenges and deliver great customer service.• Create leasing strategies and forge strong relationship with potential tenants to fulfill business objectives.• Effectively manage operations and oversee the operations from leasing and construction and handover of the leased properties.• Take own initiative to constantly look for the opportunity to engage with and attract new tenants locally and overseas.• Deliver business result (P&L etc.) within the agreed budget and allocated resources. Stimulate and drive timely execution of change to improve business performance in areas such as organizational design, matrixes, operational excellence/processes, procurement etc.Innovation Dimension• Foster and inspire a culture of innovation and an environment where fast yet well‐informed decision making is possible across the businesses.• Enable, support and reward the follow‐through‐execution of ideas that focus on key process improvements, complexity reduction, and adoption of new ways of working that ultimately maximize the returns and add value to the business.• Drive the continuous improvement mindset by ways of benchmarking, KPIs etc, and reward the efforts appropriately.Strategic and Leadership Dimension• Forward looking & risk taking: Able to function with some level of uncertainty and see it as an opportunity to explore and grow the company.• Design and shape the organization where leadership and senior management team acts as enabler, catalyst and supporter, enabling ideas to thrive.• Leverage on best practices and Operational Excellence analytics and the strength of the GROUP to support the Board and to drive the KMH Industrial as an inspirational Employer Brand with winning‐organization attributes where people will perform, enjoy and aspire to be with.
Job Requirement: • Advanced degree in Engineering, Operations/Project Management or other appropriately related business fields.• At least 10 years of experience at a management/senior leadership level, with exposure to industrial park development and planning.• Knowledge in construction and project management is a plus.• Overall business knowledge, and ability to lead, develop and implement strategic plans for the company.• Proficiency in read and spoken English and Chinese.

Job Description: Job AnnouncementZANDO Co., Ltd., founded in early 2015, one of Cambodia's leading fashion retail companies and the parent company of ZANDO, TEN11, GATONI, ROUTINE, and 361° planning to extend across the country with more upcoming brands, is currently looking for Content Creation Intern & Marketing Executive.Content Creation InternJob Description• Research, plan out, and produce effective, engaging, and creative video content for socialmedia on fashion trend videos, tips, or any related industry trends• Stay up to date with the latest trends and bring creative ideas to life by creating, filming,editing, and writing captions ready to post on social media platforms• Conduct keyword research alongside social media trending words• Target content to specific audiences (age group) and focus on trending topics• Feature in any social media video content if required• Work and support Marketing Department to produce engaging campaigns• Analyze and report web traffic to measure the success of the content to the manager• Other tasks assigned by the managerMarketing ExecutiveDuties:• Create and manage varieties of marketing campaigns• Work with Graphic Team to produce creative content and marketing materials• Support the marketing team in daily administrative tasks such as ads expense, voucher issuance, andmonthly report• Perform market analysis and research on social media to gain social media insight• Assist in marketing and advertising promotional activities such as stickers and LED• Distribute marketing materials• Assist in organizing marketing events• Other tasks will be assigned by Department Manager.
Job Requirement: Requirements for Content Creation Intern:• Have prior knowledge of TikTok, including how to: film, edit, and use TikTok features, aswell as, good knowledge of the trends and popular "sounds" being used throughout TikTokis a must• Have a good understanding of all social media platform algorithms, as well as, familiarwith mobile editing application• Have a personal laptop and mobile phone• Into fashion and social media• Able to unleash creativity into the reality• Able to travel for content shooting• Love to hustle and work flexibly in a fast pace environment• Self-taught learner willing to research and keep up-to-date on technological changes andtrends• Creative, Excellent research, Organizational, and Time management skills• Strong listening and communication skills• The capacity to work independently and collaboratively.Other benefits• Gasoline and Phone Card allowance• Shopping vouchers as incentives• Hard skill and soft skills training• Learn about marketing and fashion trends• Build a career in the marketing fieldJob Requirements for Marketing Executive:• A minimum bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a similar field• Strong desire to learn along with a professional drive• Solid understanding of different marketing techniques• Excellent verbal and written communication skills• Knowledge of MS Office• Ability to research, organizational, and time management skills• Passionately in love with FashionOther benefits:•	Yearly Bonus•	Birthday Package•	Annual Leave, Sick Leave, Special Leave, and Public Holidays•	Shopping Vouchers as incentives and more.Interested candidates are invited to submit their updated CVs, cover letter & portfolio to our email:hr@zandokh.com or TELEGRAM: 081 27 53 53For more insight into job details, please kindly contact 077 622 660/ 081 27 53 53Join us on Telegram for more job opportunities: https://t.me/zandocareer

-	Double check payment and recalculate all amounts on invoices; make sure all supporting documents (Contract, Purchase Requisition (PR), Purchase Order (PO), price comparison, Delivery Note, etc.) have been approved and have been attached

Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.

Job Description: Key Responsibilities• Define roles and responsibilities of the department staff• Set and meet department’s key milestones and development plan• Manage all processes related to design between various stakeholders; includes but not limited to presentation, confirmation, approval, etc.• Develop client’s project brief• Explore and invite competent consultants via assessment process• Manage coordination for stages of design between all stakeholders; concept, schematic, design development, tender and construction.• Facilitate and conduct design document review; includes but not limited to layout, section, elevation, typical detail, schedule, specification, coordination drawings, 3D visualisation, walkthrough animation etc.• Manage design archive pertaining to project; design brief, sign-off, mood board, catalogue, product sample, etc.• Identify and verify all design data during project feasibility stage; planning parameters, net area, gross area, total units, building height, parking, etc.• Review and ensure design is compliant to regulatory and legislative requirement and is according to design brief.• Review design to minimise design error and ensure design is safe and enhances user experience.• Participate in technical and/or design meetings and provide continual input to optimize design and minimize futile work• Other task as assigned by Senior Management
Job Requirement: Job Qualification• Master’s Degree in Architecture / Interior Design or equivalent• Min. 8-year experience as a consultant (preferred) or with a developer firm• Fluent in English• Strong technical knowledge in Architecture and Design.• Familiar with Code, Standards and Authority requirements.• Proficient in industry-standard design tools & programs; AutoCAD, MS. Office, Adobe Creative Suites, etc.• Able to multitask; manage multiple projects at different stages simultaneously.• Able to lead a team of designers, engineers and research.• Able to problem-solve, is creative and decisive• Able to work under pressure and in a fast-paced environment.• Able to review and interpret drawings from various trades.• Able to pay close attention to detail.
Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

job title: ទីប្រឹក្សាបច្ចេកទេស
position: ទីប្រឹក្សាបច្ចេកទេស
Job Description:
ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែង ដែលមានគោលបំណង      កែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដាអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្ត ជំហានបន្ទាប់ទៀត។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ (អ.គ.ហ.) ជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុមាន មុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និង   ការអនុវត្តការងារគោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួល ការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ។ 
ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព សក្ដិសិទ្ធភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អ.គ.ហ. មានតម្រូវការជ្រើសរើស ទីប្រឹក្សាបច្ចេកទេសលើការរៀបចំសេចក្តីណែនាំស្តីពីវិធីសាស្ត្រ និងនីតិវិធីរបស់រដ្ឋ-បាលឃុំ សង្កាត់ ចំនួន១រូប ដែលមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិដូចខាងក្រោម៖
	គុណវុឌ្ឍិទូទៅ
•	មានសញ្ញាបត្រកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ផ្នែកសេដ្ឋកិច្ច ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬគោលនយោបាយសាធារណៈ ឬសញ្ញា-បត្រដែលមានតម្លៃសមមូល
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកដែលខ្លួនទទួលខុសត្រូវយ៉ាងតិច ០៨ឆ្នាំ ជាពិសេសពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹង ការងាររៀបចំគោលនយោបាយ ការស្រាវជ្រាវ និងការរៀបចំគោលការណ៍ណែនាំផ្សេងៗ 
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍ ក្នុងការរៀបចំគោលការណ៍/នីតិវិធី ឬ ឯកសាទស្សនាទានផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធទៅនឹងកិច្ចលទ្ធកម្មសាធារណៈនៅថ្នាក់ក្រោមជាតិ យ៉ាងតិចចំនួន០២
•	មានចំណេះដឹងអំពីប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ការរៀបចំផែនការ និងការគ្រប់គ្រងគម្រោងវិនិយោគសាធារណៈនៅថ្នាក់ក្រោមជាតិ
•	មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេសដែលអាចប្រើការជាផ្លូវការបាន
•	មានចំណេះដឹង និងសមត្ថភាពផ្នែកវិភាគគោលនយោបាយ ពិសេសពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងថ្នាក់ក្រោមជាតិ
•	មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង  និងអាចបំពេញការងារជាក្រុម។

	ឯកសាភ្ជាប់
បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ៖
•	ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter (ជាភាសាអង់គ្លេស) 
•	សញ្ជាបត្របញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សាថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធនានា 
•	ភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប
Job Requirement:
	ការជ្រើសរើស 
ការជ្រើសរើសត្រូវធ្វើឡើងតាមរយៈការសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់ពីគណៈកម្មការជ្រើសរើស។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។ 
	ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំជ្រើសរើស 
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច Email: hr@pfm.gov.kh យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃព្រហស្បតិ៍ ១៥កើត ខែស្រាពណ៍ ឆ្នាំថោះ បញ្ចស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៧ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី៣១ ខែសីហា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ អ.គ.ហ. ទទួលពាក្យស្នើសុំចុះឈ្មោះចូលបម្រើការងារតាមរយៈប្រព័ន្ធអនឡាញ (Online) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។

	ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម
សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE

ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ	
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
បន្ទប់អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានកំណែទម្រង់ អគារ “ក” ជាន់ទី៣
ទូរស័ព្ទទាក់ទង : 077 359 949 /អ៊ីមែល: hr@pfm.gov.kh
Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។

Job Description:
- Initiate design concepts and design various artworks for social media, POSM, print ads,  magazines, and other promotion materials
- Design Chip Mong Insider magazine
- Look for best materials for printing artwork
- Edit pictures or any artworks
- Archive all artworks that have already printed or approved.
- Coordinate with printing house or purchase department to get designed materials printed.
- Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in graphic design, Photography, Arts, or related fields.Knowledge of  branding concepts
- Knowledge of marketing concepts
- Knowledge of color combination
- Advanced skills in designing programs such as Adobe Photoshop, Adobe illustrator, Adobe  InDesign, and others.
- Strong detail-oriented working personality and skills.
- At least 1 year of proven working experience in graphic design, or printing house, or related  areas.
- Knowledge of printing procedure
- Good presentation skill to interpret designing concepts.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description: ' - Prepare and ensure credit policies & procedures are followed. - To monitor the compliance of credit programs and procedures. - Report and analyze the stages of credit affairs to find the negative phenomenon which could cause credit risks.  - Check, review and make the Credit Screen report to all loan documents that receive from borrower and then make reports send to manager in charge for making the approval. - Perform and action for any loan which could cause any suspect due to capacity repayment and funding purpose. - Review and evaluate the collateral value before submitting to the management for making a final decision to maintain a secure LVR. - Review and advice related to legal document before loan disbursement. - Work directly with technical team for any request and prepare product system training to relevant departments - Daily, weekly, monthly report for management - Perform other related duties as required by line manager
Job Requirement: At least 3 years of working experience in credit screen or in banking industry/Fin-Tech industry'- Understanding about Credit/Loan policy/procedure- Understanding how to build a loan management system.- Knowledge in industry analysis, financial instruments, Credit, and business analysis- Understanding in NBC Prakas related to credit as well as NBC reporting.- Strong in negotiation skill, communication skill, coaching feedback, motivation, problem solving- High Level of Data analysist and Data management skills.- Computer Skill: Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Email/Outlook, Loan System
Company Profile:
Super App/Cambodian Single Point is a life service E-Commerce platform founded by Cambodia Information Technology Co., Ltd. and Cambodia Super App Information Technology Co., Ltd. in 2020. It is mainly engaged in online take-out and new retail instant food delivery, and catering supply chain and other businesses.
With the mission of creating a simple life, Cambodia is committed to using the new technology to create a leading one-stop service platform in Southeast Asia and the world, to promote the digitization process in Southeast Asia and bring a new Internet life experience

Job Description:
Responsibilities: 
• To support Marketing Manager and Retail Operation Team.
• To develop marketing activities that builds the responsible brand.
• To develop brand communication plan and ensure copy strategy development aligns with brand footprint.
• To ensure effective management of project including new product and tactical promotion.
• To manage admin jobs as per marketing manager assigns.
Job Requirement:
Qualifications:
• Bachelor degree in marketing or relevant feilds. 
• Excellent in English Communication Skills (Speaking, Writing, and Reading).
• Experience in Fashion at least 1 year in fashion business, retail, operations, Marketing Event, Marketing POS.
• Computer literacy PowerPoint for Presentation, Excel, Word.
• Innovative thinking, Initiative, Proactive.
• Willing to travel.

APPLICATION INFORMATION:

Contract type: 6 months (possible to extend)
We offer a competitive remuneration package to the right candidate. Interested applicants, please submit your application with a complete resume detailing experience, qualifications, present and expected salary, phone number and email address to kh-hr@jpsfashions.com or contact 098 345 292.

Only shortlist candidates will be contacted
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Canadia Tower N/A

Job Description:
- Determine the optimum size and structure of the distributors’ sales force as well as to establish balanced and manageable sales areas and territories
- Manage and control the sales forces and develop their skills, ensure monthly and yearly sales targets are met
- Formulate and maintain sales standard operating procedures and control mechanism such as basic call procedure, time management, effective coverage and work plan, etc…
- Appoint, develop, and control distributors, SD & mini-SD, plan and organize training needs of their personnel and conduct periodic business. 
- Establish close liaison with marketing to exploit new products and other business opportunities, promotions, etc….
- Work with field personnel on a regular basis/frequency
- To be permanently aware of competition activities at assigned areas and analyze
- To continuously analyze the strength/weaknesses of the distributors and propose changes and improvements
- Reports/discuss monthly sales performance of each territory and formulate strategies and action plans on how to improve them.
- Prepare monthly sales objectives
- Prepare PO planning (flexibility)
- Stock weight must order weekly from SD (carton & container)
-  Distributor Manager work closely with supply chain manager to ensure that every PO must be issue every on Wednesday of the week (& delivery is on Monday from HD to SD).
- Perform other related functions as maybe assigned by NSM/Director/CEO
Job Requirement:
** Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities Required (Qualification):
- Bachelor’s degree in sales and marketing or business administration preferred 
- 7-9 years relevant distributor or trading experiences
- Demonstrate the professional sub-distributor    
- Self-directed and able to work without supervision
- Excellence customer service
- Product-knowledge
- Problem-solving

** Personal Characteristics:
- Friendly & Honesty
- Self-directed and able to work without supervision
- Be humble, flexible and integrity
- Commitment and Working-Hard 
- Respect the Rule of company 
- Respect the teamwork

Job Description:
1. ទទួលខុសត្រូវអនុវត្តន៍ ត្រួតពិនិត្យតាមដាន និងជំរុញផែនការលក់ និងផែនការការចែកចាយក្នុងតំបន់នៃអនុចែកចាយខេត្តនីមួយៗ អោយទទួលបានជោគជ័យ និងប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់ ។
2. ចូលរួម សហការ ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាក្រុម (ថ្នាក់ក្រោម និង​ថ្នាក់លើ) ។​
3. កសាងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ជាមួយក្រុមការងាររបស់ខ្លួន អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង និងអតិថិជន របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន​ ។
4. មានភាពអ្នកដឹកនាំ​ ប្រកបដោយភាពវិជ្ជាមាន ។
5. គោរពគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមកនៅក្នុងកន្លែងការងារ មិនត្រូវមានជម្លោះផ្សេងៗ នៅក្នុងកន្លែងការងារទ្បើយ ។
6. ការកំនត់ និងតាមដានលើផែនលក់របស់ក្រុមរបស់ខ្លួននីមួយៗ អោយបានច្បាស់លាស់ ។
7. ការធ្វើផែនការ និងកំនត់តំបន់ សម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់នីមួយៗ អោយបានច្បាស់លាស់។
8. ការរៀបចំផែនតូបសរុបក្នុងតំបន់សម្រាប់ក្រុមការងារថ្នាក់ក្រោមនីមួយ FJP
9. ការរៀបចំដាក់ផែនការ តូបត្រូវចុះជួបក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ សម្រាប់ក្រុមការងារថ្នាក់ក្រោមនីមួយ Call Plan
10. ការកំនត់ផែនការ តូបដែលបានជួបក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ សម្រាប់ក្រុមការងារថ្នាក់ក្រោមនីមួយ Call Met
11. ការកំនត់ផែនការ តូបដែលត្រូវលក់បានក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ សម្រាប់ក្រុមការងារថ្នាក់ក្រោមនីមួយ  Call Eff / Bills...
12. ការរៀបចំផែនការចុះជួយក្រុមនីមួយៗ ដើម្បីសម្រេចបានតាមផែនការ (Sup. Plan) ។
13. ចុះជួយពង្រឹង និង​អភិវឌ្ឍន៍ការរៀបចំ ការតាំងទំនិញនៅលើតូបអោយបានល្អ (Rack/Hanger Display
14. ចុះរៀបចំ និងថែ​រក្សារតំបន់ស្អាតបំផុត សម្រាប់ការចុះត្រួតពិនិត្យពីអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង ឬតំណាងរោងចក្រ​ ។
Job Requirement:
• កម្រិតការសិក្សាអប់រំបានបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ លើជំនាញទីផ្សារ។
• ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារលើផ្នែកគ្រប់ការលក់ យ៉ាងតិច០២ឆ្នាំ។​
• មានសម្ថភាព​និយាយ និងសរេសេភាសារអង្គគ្លេសបានខ្លះៗ ស្របតាមការងារដែលបានដាក់ជូន ។
• មានចំណេះដឹង និងជំនាញក្នុងការលក់ និងជំនាញក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង។
• ជំនាញក្នុងការសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា។​
• មានសម្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់ កំព្យួទ័រ លើកម្មវិធី Microsoft Word Excel Power point and Internet and Email.
• មានសម្ថភាពក្នុងការធ្វើរបាយការណ៍បានល្អ ។
• មានសម្ថភាពធ្វើការ នៅក្នុងស្ថានភាពមានសម្ពាធន៍។​

Job Description:
- Establishing different accounts
- Daily checking all income and expense transaction and making report
- Maintaining records of financial transactions by posting and verifying
- Defining bookkeeping policies and procedures
- Developing systems to account for financial transactions by establishing a chart of accounts
- Maintaining subsidiary accounts by posting, verifying and allocating transactions
- Reconciling entries to balance subsidiary accounts
- Maintaining a balanced general ledger
- Preparing a trial balance for the accountants
- Preparing financial reports by collecting, analyzing and summarizing accounting for information
- Ensuring compliance with federal, state and local legal requirements
- Monitoring for variances from the projected budget
- Advising management on compliance needs
- Assisting in financial activities such as running payroll and generating invoices
- Knowing and accessing QuickBooks Accounting System well
- Experience working in a fast-paced environment
- Others task assigned by Manager
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Accounting, Banking or Finance related field
- At least 2 years of experience in accounting and/or Tax
- Knowledge of accounting transaction in manufacturing and trading company
- Knowledge of Cambodia Tax Law
- Advance MS Office skills
- Strong presentation and report-writing skills in English and Khmer
- Strong interpersonal skills
- Strong management and leadership skills
- Strong analytical and logical thinking skills
- Ability to think creatively and innovatively
- Ability to work under pressure.

Job Description:
- Define and create General Ledger, class, and items for accounting posting.
- Perform annual tax return closing and ensure all the taxable income is posted and delivered timely and properly.
- Review the historical accounting data to prepare reports for tax audit
- Estimate all tax payable of the company for accrual booking in the accounting system.
- Review company financial reports for inaccuracy before declaring to General Department of Taxation.
- Develop reports for daily process control and management.
- Facilitate tax budget planning.
- Conduct monthly presentation to report progress and seek for improvement in accounting process.
- Work with related team to find solution for issues related to tax accounting.
- Define risk in special requests from stakeholders.
- Support and coordinate subordinates with daily tasks and problem solving.
- Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in accounting or a related field.
- At least 2 years of experience in accounting and/or Tax
- Knowledge of accounting transaction in manufacturing and trading company
- Knowledge of Cambodia Tax Law
- Advance MS Office skills
- Advance level in ERP System
- Strong presentation and report-writing skills in English and Khmer
- Strong interpersonal skills
- Strong management and leadership skills
- Strong analytical and logical thinking skills
- Ability to think creatively and innovatively
- Ability to work under pressure.

Job Description: KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES•	Develops and monitors the Product Development Plan and Cycle Plan to meet the company, brand and volume objectives and reflects the needs and priorities of the individual Customer clusters, channels and key Accounts.•	Champions the implementation of company Operational and Strategic Management Frameworks to deliver flawless management of planning and execution of programs and activities •	Collates and analyses data from available systems, sales & services, marketing and financial reports, researches, trade audits and customer, account performance in order to identify markets, services, products, channels, customer clusters weaknesses and opportunities and account priorities; and evaluates their performances in order to provide recommendations and solutions to deliver company objectives.•	Maintains spreadsheets (database and project plans), prepares guidelines and decks to make sure all information is well recorded and up to date; and provides regular Products, Sales and Marketing information and reports on market trends, competitor strategy and performance analysis, the level of achievement of own Product, Sales and Marketing strategy and plans to ensure all relevant management teams are fully informed at all times. •	Drives the development and improvement of monthly company dashboard report and prepares quarterly business review decks for senior management review. •	Manages the development, production and installation of in-store advertising materials in order to maximize the awareness and imagery of strategic brands in the prioritized trade channels within budget and on time.•	Develops national presence marketing programs which reflect trade merchandising policies by channel and outlet type in order to achieve the highest in-store visibility of the key strategic brands.  •	Develops, monitors and evaluates both customer and consumer promotions for the priority customer channels, clusters and key accounts on time and within budget in order to maximize the return on investment and ensure adequate levels of customer and consumer participation. Provides analysis of campaign performance reports at the end of campaign, with results, key outcomes and learnings•	Assists Sales and Services managers in the development of key customer partners through the formulation and implementation of sales and account strategies and plans in order to maximize growth and share performance.•	Keeps Sales and Services managers fully informed at all times of new channel and account developments, trends and competitor activity in order that opportunities and weaknesses are addressed through effective planning and execution of in-market activities.•	Manages and controls Product Development budgets in an efficient and economical way to ensure that effective customer and channel programs are developed and implemented in line with company brand, volume and profit objectives.•	Motivates, trains and develops people in the department to the highest levels to ensure that the products, brands, customer clusters, channels and accounts objectives are achieved through the applications of highly professional approaches.

Job Description: KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES•	Leads and develops the entire Tour Leader and Event Management team, overseeing all activities of the team in ensuring proper execution of plans and strategy to deliver objectives•	Supervises Tour Leader & Event Management personnel and ensuring accurate execution of their duties. Acts as a mentor to key talents to encourage their professional growth, and to ready them for the succession of higher positions in the future.•	Champions Tour Leader & Event Management skill development to build and improve capabilities through regular Product Trainings, Functional Trainings and partnering with HR to equip necessary soft skill trainings to identified key talents.•	Secures and build sufficient and qualified Tour Leader & Event management talent pool of both internal and external freelancer by ensuring effective allocations of jobs, balancing recruitment of internal resource, attractive yet cost-competitive numeration and benefits and equipping right development programs.   •	Continuously improves Operational Processes and Standards of preparation and coordination of pre and post tour excursion meetings, screening holidaymakers’ profiles (inclusive of special conditions and requests), travel document compliances, resource arrangements, post excursion evaluation, learning logs, post trip reports and compliances to financial policies and memorandums in order to drive excellence and attainment of the desirable long term sustainable customer satisfaction.•	Develops and implements Free Hardship Travel strategy and plan to achieve an improved customer experience in the areas of airport transfer, check in, transits, emigration clearance, luggage claim, lose and found, local guides coordination, hotel check in/out, booking arrangements, hotel and other visiting sites facilities, rules and regulation briefs. Job Description:
**Job Description Summary
The Logistics Executive reports to Supply Chain Manager, manage, plan and organize the Logistics activities
and tasks to achieve the overall objectives related to profitability, competitiveness, customer satisfaction,
service and quality.- Handling Import and Export Shipment including checking HS Code declarations.
- Plan and optimize import and export routes.

consistent quality. Evaluates and recommends new/substitute vendors, when necessary

carriers' performance and tariff charges and determines best carriers for the most cost-effective
and reliable delivery.

ISO14001, ISO 45001, JOS, and Jotun’s HSEQ Management system.
- Executive the shipments from production to the end-user and warehouse
- Coordinate with Warehouse Workers to ensure proper storage and schedule stock in
- Monitor and report on import and export clearance cost and other relevant KPIs.
- Ensure shipping documents are properly declare according to local law and regulation and filed.
Job Requirement:

- Bachelor: Minimum Diploma with 3 to 4 years of experience in Logistics handling goods

- Executes plans with commitment and determination; achieves high quality results.

- Quickly understands and analyses complex issues and problems; comes up with sound and rational
judgments.• Communicates in a clear, precise, and structured way; speaks with authority and conviction;
presents effectively.

development academy.
• A chance to work with different people from different countries.
• We are a values-driven organization where Respect, Loyalty, Care and Boldness are core to the
culture and success of our org

data.

regional initiatives to achieve targ

Job Description:

company_name: SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISE BANK OF CAMBODIA (SME)
Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEWThe postholder will develop effective strategy and compliance policy for promoting innovation across SME Bank. Working closely with colleagues across the sector, ensuring coherent to comply with local and international regulations and will:- Assist to implement and administer anti-money laundering and countering financing of terrorism (AML/CFT) policies and procedures - Assist in the compliance function of the trust-related business - Conduct Client Due Diligence for onboarding of new clients, including screening client through World-Check and another on-line search - Facilities, and verification of client KYC documents - Perform client risk profile to assign an AML risk rating to structures and undertake periodic review of files based on clients AML risk rating and profiling. - Assist organize meetings with business managers with regards to compliance matters, including risk management - Assist with compilation of data and preparation of reports for submission to Compliance Manager - Carry out compliance monitoring program to ensure that the business is conducted in accordance with Group AML/CFT policies and procedures - Assist to Complete AML questionnaire for correspondent banks, RMA banks, and other local banks - Participate in projects to give Compliance perspective - Maintain Register of High-Risk Clients, and monitor the transactions of such clients - Assist and deliver and track AML training to all staff - Keep Senior Management up to date with new developments in the regulatory environment. - Ad hoc duties/projects as assigned by senior management - Monitors, researches and evaluates the risks of clients operating within the Bank and the integration of analytical and investigative information into other relevant system programs or recording note. - Reviewing the research, analyzing the chain of transactions, Link Analysis, and the purpose of transactions and payments between banks and internal, external customers. - Monitoring and responding to information related to customer's transactions with our correspondent banks in a timely manner and ensuring effective communication within the Bank and mutual information with the National Bank's Cambodia Financial Intelligence Unit (CAFIU) is accurate, timely, and all information is strictly confidential. - Monitoring all NBC law releases, regulations, announcements, and instructions that require the banking institution to comply with and report to the relevant management regarding any non-compliant transactions. - Any task work as the manager assigns.
Job Requirement: ** Skills & Abilities• Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance & Banking, Law, or other related fields;• At least 3 years of professional experience in banking and finance industry preferably in compliance, risk, and internal or external audit;• Basic understanding of AML and CFT;• Good analytical skills, and logical thinking• Good command in Khmer and English;• Basic computer skills;• Effective teamwork, communication, and presentation skills;• Good math skills and ability to spot numerical errors;• Strong dedication to accuracy and efficiency
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, # S, OCIC Street, Phum Kien Khleang, Sangkat Chraoy Chongvar, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh 093768111

Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Basic knowledge of the business indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register programme and Pathfinder operation.
• Internal regulations and some knowledge of employment legislation.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organisation, management and planning.
• Able to analyse and offer solutions.
• A motivator with leadership qualities.
• Communicative and persuasive.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Ability to adapt – energy and speed.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
